channel.title: Need Coder
channel.description:
hello, i am looking for a coder that is willing to code a server with (for me) i am happy to pay if that is what is needed but i would also like to learn coding at the same time
i am looking for a coder that can simply: change home and npc's, etc. add shops to my liking make sure there is some form of dung with working token shop working bosses a custom unique mini game. add donator ranks & donator zone etc.
and that is it really, i know it seems alot but if you would like to earn a bit of cash ;P then add me on skype - 'supeirman'

item.title: Need Coder
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Here we offer our services for free, and we do not allow members to reward other users for services. With that being said, please remove your offer of payment.

Edit: Please read this topic and then create a new one. This section is for hiring a team, not individuals.

Read full topic

i will be glad to help

item.title: Need Coder
item.dc:creator: @NathDzn NathDzn
item.description:
@NathDzn wrote:

[quote=“Jayden., post:3, topic:515090”][quote author=NathDzn link=topic=633341.msg4279007#msg4279007 date=1365286477]
hello, i am looking for a coder that is willing to code a server with (for me) i am happy to pay if that is what is needed but i would also like to learn coding at the same time

i am looking for a coder that can simply:
change home and npc’s, etc.
add shops to my liking
make sure there is some form of dung with working token shop
working bosses
a custom unique mini game.
add donator ranks & donator zone etc.

and that is it really, i know it seems alot but if you would like to earn a bit of cash
then add me on skype - ‘supeirman’
[/quote]

Are you trying to say, you want someone to do everything for you?[/quote]
yes, yes i am but like i said i am willing to pay

Read full topic
